alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 10:22AM CDT until June 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. .Light rainfall is possible over the next few days which should have a minimum impact on the current river levels. The current forecast continues to signal a receding trend in river levels through next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Water reaches flood mitigation culverts on Riverside Road * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 630 AM CDT Thursday, June 09, the stage was 20.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 630 AM CDT Thursday was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.4 feet on 05/31/2004. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
